casebody.data:
David McAdams, Plaintiff,
v.
North Carolina Department of Commerce, Division of Employment Security, and Dale Folwell, in his Official Capacity as Assistant Secretary, Division of Employment Security, and Dale Folwell, in his Individual Capacity, and Secretary of Commerce, in their [sic] Official Capacity, and Maurice Antwon Keith, in his Official Capacity as Unemployment Insurance Benefits Administrator, Division of Employment Security, and Maurice Antwon Keith, in his Individual Capacity, Defendants. No. COA16-196 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 6, 2016

AFFIRMED.
